source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic storm developing over a vast, open field. The dark, heavy clouds are seen rapidly swirling and rolling across the sky. Rain can be seen falling in the distance as the storm system moves over the landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a dramatic storm developing over a vast, open field. The dark, heavy clouds are seen rapidly swirling and rolling across the sky. Rain can be seen falling in the distance as the storm system moves over the landscape.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the subject as a time-lapse of a developing storm, but it lacks specificity and omits key visual events. The description of the clouds as "rapidly swirling and rolling" is too generic; in the video, the clouds are seen building vertically into a large cumulonimbus formation before organizing into a distinct, dark shelf cloud that advances from left to right across the entire frame. A significant and dramatic element completely missing from the caption is the frequent lightning; the video clearly shows bright, intra-cloud flashes that illuminate the storm from within, as well as several distinct cloud-to-ground strikes on the distant horizon. Furthermore, stating that "rain can be seen falling in the distance" is an understatement. The video shows multiple, well-defined rain shafts that sweep across the field, progressively obscuring the landscape as the storm system moves through the area. The caption should describe the specific formation and directional movement of the clouds and incorporate the crucial motion of the lightning and the sweeping rain shafts to provide a more accurate and complete account of the events shown.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video captures the dramatic development of a storm over a vast, open field. Watch as the clouds build vertically into a towering cumulonimbus formation, eventually organizing into a distinct, dark shelf cloud that advances from left to right across the entire frame. The storm is electrified by frequent lightning, with bright intra-cloud flashes illuminating the scene and several striking cloud-to-ground bolts visible on the distant horizon. Multiple well-defined rain shafts sweep across the field, progressively obscuring the landscape as the storm system moves through, creating a powerful and mesmerizing display of nature's fury.
